name: Where There's Smoke
description:
Take a leisurely walk through a beautiful forest on two, stumpy iron legs.

Play as Bernie, a sentient furnace on an exploitative adventure. Interact with other machines, and find your way through the wilderness. You have a purpose… but you can’t quite remember what it is. Guess you’ll have to wing it!

Your only concern is your delicate flame, slowly dwindling within.

This game was made in 72 hours for the 44th Ludum Dare! If you're a Ludum Dare developer and liked the game, consider leaving a review?

  • WASD or Arrow Key movement
  • E for interactions
  • SPACE to expel jets of fire!
  • ESC to switch between fullscreen and windowed
  • C to voluntarily decrease health
